description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jungle is a traditional Chinese board game that takes minutes to learn and months to master. A game of Jungle is a quick match compared to other strategy boardgames, yet there is great depth in its handful of playing pieces. Features new boards expanding on the classic gameplay, luscious artwork, and a sweeping soundtrack. Jungle is an adventure for thinkers of all ages
